H0.text: Who won a Nobel prize in 1918 for his Law of Radiation and is the originator of Quantum Theory. Albert Einstein

H1.text: Who won a Nobel prize in 1918 for his Law of Radiation and is the originator of Quantum Theory. Niels Bohr

H2.text: Who won a Nobel prize in 1918 for his Law of Radiation and is the originator of Quantum Theory. Louis de Broglie

H3.text: Who won a Nobel prize in 1918 for his Law of Radiation and is the originator of Quantum Theory. Planck

A4.text: Planck was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics for 1918

A5.text: Planck was the originator of quantum theory
